analysis_metadata.analysis_scope: Complete GUI test suite failure analysis

mock_session_state_issues.description: MockSessionState not properly implementing iterable interface
mock_session_state_issues.fix_priority: HIGH - Fix once, resolves multiple tests

session_state_management.description: Core session state management logic broken

test_infrastructure_automation.description: Test utilities infrastructure missing temp_path attribute

api_changes_from_refactoring.description: Module APIs changed during GUI refactoring, tests not updated
api_changes_from_refactoring.fix_priority: MEDIUM - Update tests to match new APIs

failures.root_cause: Missing function in module - refactoring broke API contract
failures.suggested_fix: Add missing render_advanced_config_page function or update test to use correct API

failures.error_message: Config page failed: argument of type 'MockSessionState' is not iterable
failures.root_cause: MockSessionState implementation doesn't match Streamlit API expectations
failures.suggested_fix: Update MockSessionState to properly implement iterable interface

failures.error_message: Train page failed: argument of type 'MockSessionState' is not iterable
failures.root_cause: Same MockSessionState issue as Config Page - systemic problem
failures.suggested_fix: Fix MockSessionState implementation to be iterable

failures.error_message: Home page rendering failed: too many values to unpack (expected 2)
failures.root_cause: Function return signature changed - tuple unpacking mismatch
failures.suggested_fix: Update tuple unpacking to match current function return format

failures.root_cause: Session state update logic not working - log streaming state not updated
failures.suggested_fix: Debug SessionStateManager.update_from_log_stream_info implementation

failures.root_cause: Training stats extraction not working - returns None instead of parsed values
failures.suggested_fix: Fix log parsing regex or extraction logic in SessionStateManager

failures.root_cause: Session reset logic not working - state not changing as expected
failures.suggested_fix: Review SessionStateManager.reset_training_session implementation

failures.root_cause: Process lifecycle state transitions not working correctly
failures.suggested_fix: Debug process state management in SessionStateManager

failures.error_message: module 'scripts.gui.utils.data_stats' has no attribute expected function
failures.root_cause: data_stats module API changed or function moved
failures.suggested_fix: Update import path or function name to match current API

failures.error_message: Expected 'start_training_session' to be called once. Called 0 times.
failures.root_cause: Async training execution not calling expected function - integration broken
failures.suggested_fix: Debug execute_training_async implementation and mock setup

failures.error_message: Expected 'abort_training' to be called once. Called 0 times.
failures.root_cause: Training abort functionality not working - function not called
failures.suggested_fix: Review abort_training implementation and mock expectations

failures.root_cause: UI component changed - button not present or renamed
failures.suggested_fix: Update test to look for correct button name/ID or add missing button

failures.root_cause: psutil import missing or incorrectly imported in run_manager module
failures.suggested_fix: Add proper psutil import to run_manager module

failures.error_message: module 'scripts.gui.utils.config_io' has no attribute expected function
failures.root_cause: config_io module API changed during refactoring
failures.suggested_fix: Update test to use correct config_io API methods

failures.root_cause: Test utilities mock object incorrect - needs temp_path attribute
failures.suggested_fix: Update test_utilities mock to include temp_path attribute

failures.root_cause: Same test utilities issue - systemic problem across automation tests
failures.suggested_fix: Create proper test utilities fixture with temp_path support

failures.root_cause: Same test utilities issue - affects multiple automation tests
failures.suggested_fix: Fix test utilities infrastructure for all automation tests

failures.root_cause: Same test utilities issue - systemic infrastructure problem
failures.suggested_fix: Comprehensive test utilities refactor for automation tests

failures.root_cause: Same test utilities issue - infrastructure needs redesign
failures.suggested_fix: Implement proper test utilities pattern for integration tests

failures.root_cause: Same test utilities issue - final instance of systemic problem
failures.suggested_fix: Complete test utilities infrastructure overhaul

failures.root_cause: Mock expectation not met - warning function not called as expected
failures.suggested_fix: Review GPU detection logic and update mock expectations

failures.root_cause: System status logic changed - assertion always fails
failures.suggested_fix: Review system status implementation and update test logic

failures.root_cause: Logo component API changed or moved during refactoring
failures.suggested_fix: Update import and usage to match current logo component API

failures.root_cause: Theme component API changed during GUI refactoring
failures.suggested_fix: Update test to use current theme component interface

failures.root_cause: Caching implementation changed in data_stats module
failures.suggested_fix: Update performance test to match current caching API

failures.root_cause: Error categorization logic changed - severity levels reassigned
failures.suggested_fix: Update test expectations to match current error severity classification

failures.root_cause: Duplicate of error categorization issue - same root cause
failures.suggested_fix: Update both error console tests with consistent severity expectations

failures.root_cause: Cancellation mechanism not working - task completed instead of being cancelled
failures.suggested_fix: Review cancellation token implementation and timing

failures.root_cause: Process tree information retrieval not working as expected
failures.suggested_fix: Debug get_process_tree_info_wrapper return values
